description: Narrative opening hooks that draw readers into personal stories

patterns.template: I {past_action} and {unexpected_outcome}. Here's what I learned:
examples: I quit my job without a plan and doubled my income. Here's what I learned:
I cold-emailed 100 strangers and changed my career. Here's what I learned:
I failed 3 startups and found my calling. Here's what I learned:

patterns.template: Two years ago, I was {past_situation}. Today, I'm {current_situation}. Here's how:
examples: Two years ago, I was unemployed and broke. Today, I'm running a 6-figure business. Here's how:
Two years ago, I was working 80-hour weeks. Today, I work 4 hours a day. Here's how:
Two years ago, I was invisible on LinkedIn. Today, I have 50k followers. Here's how:

patterns.template: My {relationship} told me {advice}. I ignored it. Big mistake.
examples: My mentor told me to specialize. I ignored it. Big mistake.
My mom told me to save money first. I ignored it. Big mistake.
My boss told me to focus on relationships. I ignored it. Big mistake.

patterns.template: The moment that changed my {area} forever:
examples: The moment that changed my career forever:
The moment that changed my mindset forever:
The moment that changed my relationships forever:

patterns.template: I used to {old_behavior}. Then I discovered {revelation}. Everything changed.
examples: I used to network constantly. Then I discovered quality over quantity. Everything changed.
I used to work all the time. Then I discovered the power of focus. Everything changed.
I used to chase every opportunity. Then I discovered saying no. Everything changed.
